mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_NOTICE n JOIN t_staff s ON n.staff_cd = s.staff_cd WHERE n.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY n.create_dt DESC, n.notice_cd DESC

SELECT * FROM T_NOTICE n JOIN t_staff s ON n.staff_cd = s.staff_cd WHERE n.use_yn = 'Y' AND (n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%') OR n.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%')) ORDER BY n.create_dt DESC, n.notice_cd DESC
SELECT * FROM T_NOTICE n JOIN t_staff s ON n.staff_cd = s.staff_cd WHERE n.use_yn = 'Y' AND n.notice_cd = #{notice_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_NOTICE (title, content, staff_cd) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{staff_cd})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_NOTICE SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_dt = #{update_dt} WHERE notice_cd = #{notice_cd} AND use_yn = 'Y'
UPDATE T_NOTICE SET use_yn = 'N' WHERE notice_cd = #{notice_cd}
